comments: Collected plants in Mexico c.1833.  Didn't publish himself. Some of his collections are referred to in DC. Prodr.
examples: Solanum heterodoxum Andrieux n. 191 in syn. sub. Solanum chrysacanthum Dunal in Prodr. (DC.) 13(1): 330 (1852)
source: Lanjouw & Stafleu, Index Herb. Collectors A-H: 37 (1954).
